    • Constructor Detail

      • Fractal

        public Fractal(java.lang.String name,
               double lowerX,
               double upperX,
               double lowerY,
               double upperY)
        Initialize with defaults: Max Passes: 255 Bounds: X: [-1.8,-1.7] Y: [-0.08,0.025]
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the fractal set (E.g. "Mandelbrot")
        lowerX - lower X Bound
        upperX - upper X Bound
        lowerY - lower Y Bound
        upperY - upper Y Bound

      • Fractal

        public Fractal(java.lang.String name,
               int rows,
               int cols,
               double lowerX,
               double upperX,
               double lowerY,
               double upperY)
        Set rows and columns upon construction
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the fractal set (E.g. "Mandelbrot")
        rows - amount of rows in points array
        cols - amount of columns in points array
        lowerX - lower X Bound
        upperX - upper X Bound
        lowerY - lower Y Bound
        upperY - upper Y Bound
